name: Last Hope: Zombie Shooter
description:
This is a 2D top-down zombie shooter game made in Unity.

Not the best, but not the worst either!

This is my first game made in Unity so if It is bad.. Please forgive me.

I own no art except flowers in this game. All credits to the original creators of them.

I also do not own any audio in this game. as always, credits to their original owners.
